Class PoiMaking

java.lang.Object
PoiMaking
public class PoiMaking extends Object
A class of tools used to convert from Arraylists to JSON and Backwards

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PoiMaking(org.json.JSONObject userData)
    Constructs a PoiMaking object, which reads the user's own JSON file, loading the created POIs into the POI list, and the favorited POIs into the favorites list.

  • Constructor Details

    • PoiMaking

      public PoiMaking(org.json.JSONObject userData) throws IOException
      Constructs a PoiMaking object, which reads the user's own JSON file, loading the created POIs into the POI list, and the favorited POIs into the favorites list.
      Parameters:
      userData - the JSON object representing user data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the JSON file.
